QuestData.Title: A Spear Through My Side, A Chain Through My Soul
QuestData.Description: My fate is sealed. The yaungol put this spear in my side. The wound will kill me.$b$bThe yaungol hold me in place with their twisted, corrupted magic. The indignity of it hurts worse than my spear-wound.$b$bMy death, I cannot stop. My imprisonment... you may be able to help me with this.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: A powerful mist-shaman of the Osul tribe.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Dmong Naruuk, the shaman who holds Orbiss hostage.
QuestData.CompletionText: I will not die before having my revenge.
QuestData.RewardText: I am freed.$b$bThe yaungol must be stopped.
